body.name: Rechargeable Makeup Mirror with 82 LED Lights 11''Travel Makeup Mirror with 3 Color Modes Portable LED Lighted Travel Vanity Makeup Mirror Touch Screen Dimming Folding Cosmetic Travel Mirror

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 24 mins
features: 💡【Powerful 3colors Makeup Mirror】Compare with the traditional makeup mirrors,Mlogiroa travel makeup mirror has done upgrades in power and functionality.Travel makeup mirror with light surrounded by 82pcs bright LED lights allowing you to have perfect visual effects in different lighting environments.Lighted Makeup mirrors have 3color modes to meet your makeup needs for different occasions.You can switch between natural(4000K),warm(3000K)and cool(6000K)colors with a touch screen switch.

🔋【Rechargeable Travel Makeup Mirror】Mlogiroa travel makeup mirror with light is built-in 1600mAh lithium battery.Folding makeup mirror only takes 2hs to fully charge and vanity mirror provides up to 4.2hs of continuously working time in strong light after fully charge.You could charge travel makeup mirror by a laptop,charger or mobile power supply via Micro USB for charging,no worry about replacing the batteries of makeup mirror with light.💗Valentines Day Gift for Her💗

👌【Touch Screen Makeup Mirror with Lights】Travel makeup mirror with light adopts a high-sensitivity touch button design,which is more convenient to use and longer life than traditional travel vanity mirror keys.Lighting color modes and brightness both control by the touch screen switch of the travel mirror with lights.Double touch the switch to select 3 color lighting modes and just long press to dim or bright the led lights between 100%, 50% and 10% brightness.

💎【Portable LED Travel Mirror】The size of Mlogiroa travel mirror with lights is like ipad mini,18.5x24x2cm(7.3*9.5*0.8inch).Lighted travel makeup mirror is thin,flat and convenient after folding.Not need to take up too much space.Put folding travel vanity mirror in your backpack or suitcase when you go outside,so that you can travel easily without worries.When the LED travel vanity mirror is opened,it can be fixed from 90 degrees to 75 degrees.

🔎【HD Portable Lighted Makeup Mirror】This makeup mirror for travel is made of high-quality ABS and glass.Every detail of your face can be clearly seen,and it is more durable than ordinary plastic mirrors.It's very suitable for makeup,shaving,daily skincare,etc.Lighted makeup mirror can bring unexpected surprise for people who love make-up,beauty experts,make-up artists etc.Mlogiroa makeup mirror with light promise that provide all our customers with excellent lighted makeup mirror and services.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great compact mirror!
reviews.reviewText: I got the smaller mirror for traveling. The other reviews look like it is for the other bigger size. This mirror is amazing. Is small and thin. It has 3 light settings, warm, cool and neutral. The light is so bright. Its easy to charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Carry and stylish
reviews.reviewText: I love this compact makeup carrier with the added light. It’s very spacious to include makeup brushes as well. I keep this in my car for convenience when traveling. It’s a worthwhile purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not for travel
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a mirror I lost, I am still disappointed I cannot find a good self standing fold out mirror in a 5x4 sized frame. This mirror is bulky and is specifically designed for your at home vanity. It does not do hand held to self standing conversion. Still it was the only replacement I could find and the quality is decent. It will not stand up to a higher impact risk environment so best leave it at your vanity station.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not my fave
reviews.reviewText: I travel frequently for work and was looking for a lighted mirror to help in those hotel bathrooms that aren’t bright (or have yellow lighting). This wasn’t my favorite. It travels well but it’s not super bright and I didn’t find it to be as helpful when putting on my makeup. It’s okay but there might be better ones out there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Terrible Charging Port
reviews.reviewText: The first mirror I ordered had a loose charging port right out of the box and wouldn’t charge correctly without rigging it up to just the right angle so I got a replacement. It was good at first but eventually the same thing happened and now it’s super loose inside. Literally moves around when trying to plug the cord in. I don’t really understand the lighting settings either. First and third settings seem the same to me and the second is really dim.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s what I wanted for a gift . Very pleased 🌲

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have had this product for maybe a month and the area in the back where you plug in the cord to turn it on has broken…even with it plugged in it is extremely dim. Will be buying another one somewhere else because I do use it everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I so wanted this to work better
reviews.reviewText: The light is nice and thin,fits in my makeup tote-but the biggest problem is that it does not holda charge. It takes longer to charge than it stays on. The 3 types of light are nice,just dont try holding the mirror or you will accidentally change the setting.Its best sitting in place,and unless able to stay plugged in,have to have a secondary light source.
